data.current_description: Translates input text, returning translated text.
data.description_suggestion: Translates input text from a source language to a target language. Accepts text content and language codes as query parameters. Returns a TranslationsListResponse containing the translated text, detected source language, and translation metadata. Supports batch translation of multiple text segments.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks critical details about parameters (source/target language codes), expected inputs (text content), and response structure. AI agents need clarity on required vs optional parameters and what metadata is returned to determine if this operation matches their translation intent.

data.current_description: Translates input text, returning translated text.
data.description_suggestion: Translates input text from a source language to a target language using a POST request. Accepts a TranslateTextRequest containing text content, target language code, and optional source language code. Returns a TranslationsListResponse with translated text and language detection results. Supports multiple text segments in a single request.

data.current_description: Detects the language of text within a request.
data.description_suggestion: Detects the language of provided text using a GET request with query parameters. Useful for identifying text language before translation.

data.current_description: Returns a list of supported languages for translation.

Use this operation to discover available translation language pairs before initiating translation requests.
